issue.title: [FCD] Rename packaged_task::operator bool()

discussion.p: packaged_task provides operator bool() to check whether an object has an associated asynchronous state. The various future types provide a member function valid() that does the same thing. The names of these members should be the same.

issue.resolution: Replaced the name packaged_task::operator bool() with packaged_task::valid() in the synopsis (30.6.10 [futures.task]/2) and the member function specification (before 30.6.10.1 [futures.task.members]/15).
